description: To create a CSG file in CounterSketch, select File → Export , name the file, and click Save . To open a CSG file in CounterSketch, select File → Import , navigate to the location of the CSG file, and click Open .
NOTE: Stuller CounterSketch is available in 3 different editions: CounterSketch Bridal, CounterSketch Plus, and CounterSketch Studio.
